info.name: Help me fix my jittering lines?
info.description: I sample a texture, and use its value to draw dFdx/dFdy-antialised lines. When the texture is sampled at an angle or far away, the lines jitter. How to fix? In the real world I have a 3D camera + terrain. Simulating it here by warping and zooming.
